verses.kjv: O sing unto the LORD a new song: sing unto the LORD, all the earth.
verses.ct: Sing a fresh song to the LORD! Sing to the LORD, everyone on earth!

verses.kjv: Sing unto the LORD, bless his name; shew forth his salvation from day to day.
verses.ct: Sing to the LORD and praise his name! Proclaim his salvation every single day.

verses.kjv: Declare his glory among the heathen, his wonders among all people.
verses.ct: Tell the nations about his glory; announce his amazing works to every people.

verses.kjv: For the LORD is great, and greatly to be praised: he is to be feared above all gods.
verses.ct: The LORD is great and deserves the highest praise. He is to be deeply revered above all gods.

verses.kjv: For all the gods of the nations are idols: but the LORD made the heavens.
verses.ct: All the gods of the nations are nothing but idols, but the LORD made the heavens.

verses.kjv: Honour and majesty are before him: strength and beauty are in his sanctuary.
verses.ct: Honor and majesty surround him; strength and beauty fill his sanctuary.

verses.kjv: Give unto the LORD, O ye kindreds of the people, give unto the LORD glory and strength.
verses.ct: Attribute to the LORD, all families of the earth — attribute to the LORD glory and strength.

verses.kjv: Give unto the LORD the glory due unto his name: bring an offering, and come into his courts.
verses.ct: Attribute to the LORD the glory his name deserves. Bring an offering and enter his courts.

verses.kjv: O worship the LORD in the beauty of holiness: fear before him, all the earth.
verses.ct: Worship the LORD in the splendor of holiness; tremble with reverence before him, all the earth.

verses.kjv: Say among the heathen that the LORD reigneth: the world also shall be established that it shall not be moved: he shall judge the people righteously.
verses.ct: Announce among the nations that the LORD rules! The world stands firm and cannot be shaken. He will judge all peoples with fairness.

verses.kjv: Let the heavens rejoice, and let the earth be glad; let the sea roar, and the fulness thereof.
verses.ct: Let the heavens celebrate and the earth be glad! Let the sea thunder along with everything in it!

verses.kjv: Let the field be joyful, and all that is therein: then shall all the trees of the wood rejoice
verses.ct: Let the fields overflow with joy, and everything growing in them. Then all the trees of the forest will shout with delight

verses.kjv: Before the LORD: for he cometh, for he cometh to judge the earth: he shall judge the world with righteousness, and the people with his truth.
verses.ct: in the presence of the LORD, because he is coming — he is coming to judge the earth. He will judge the world with righteousness and all peoples with his truth.
